General.Name: Israel Canada
General.Description: Pangaea Real-Estate Ltd. is a principal investment firm specializing in investments in real estate. The firm seeks to invest in Europe. Pangaea Real-Estate Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.
